history.content:
I am posting the below message on behalf of my manager of my last internship, who is now hiring for the below position.

This is a virtual internship opportunity at Solidigm, which was formerly Intel’s NAND SSD business, and is now a privately held subsidiary of SK Hynix.

Job Description

As an intern in the Feature Domain Team, you will be developing and characterizing Test content to validate Data Center SSDs. This is a great opportunity to hone your software skills and get a deep understanding of the internals of Solid State Drives (SSDs). You will also be exposed to real world Data Center Storage use cases. The Feature Domain team is part of the Data Center Product Validation organization, responsible for ensuring that customers don’t find any SSD bugs when they integrate the cutting edge Solidigm storage solutions in their Data Centers. You will also get to work on some really cool and new Test frameworks, that we are pioneering.

Qualifications

Undergrad in Computer Engineering/Science
Python (required), Computer Architecture, SSD fundamentals, OS/Driver Debug

If you are interested in this position, please send me a note at howardho2021@berkeley.edu then apply at:

https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/Solidigm/743999804236496-content-development-intern

Thank you!

- Howard Ho
